title: Regarding device support for pixel 2 xl
content:
Need a few more clarifications - 
1. As device support (online\chat) of google pixel 2 XL will going to end means you are not going to provide support for pixel 2 xl devices
So in case of any service need, where should I contact or who will repair the phone  ?

2.  Also for example if the phone is completely in dead condition, so how to chat\contact customer care or from where to raise a ticket or service request ?

Kindly clear some doubt as i fear of service availability of pixel 2 xl after few months as per your official page you will be ending support
